Get raw detections data

Source: R/get_detections.R
get_detections.Rd

Get the raw detections data, with optional filters for the project, the start- and enddate, the deployment station name and the transmitter/tag identifier. Use the limit option to limit the data size.

get_detections(connection, network_project = NULL, animal_project = NULL,
  start_date = NULL, end_date = NULL, deployment_station_name = NULL,
  transmitter = NULL, receiver = NULL, scientific_name = NULL,
  limit = NULL)

Arguments

connection

A valid connection with the ETN database.
network_project

(character) One or more network projects.
animal_project

(character) One or more animal projects.
start_date

(character) Date in ISO 8601 format, e.g. 2018-01-01. Date definition on month (e.g. 2018-03) or year (e.g. 2018) level are supported as well.
end_date

(character) Date in ISO 8601 format, e.g. 2018-01-01. Date definition on month (e.g. 2018-03) or year (e.g. 2018) level are supported as well.
deployment_station_name

(character) One or more deployment station names.
transmitter

(character) One or more transmitter identifiers, also referred to as `tag_code_space` identifiers
receiver

(character) One or more receiver identifiers.
scientific_name

(character) One or more scientific names.
limit

(integer) Limit the number of records to download. If NULL, all records are downloaded.

Value

data.frame

Examples

# NOT RUN {
con <- connect_to_etn(your_username, your_password)

# Get detection data filtered by the start year
get_detections(con, start_date = "2017", limit = 100)

# Get detection data within time frame for specific animal project and
# network project
get_detections(con, animal_project = "phd_reubens",
               network_project = "thornton", start_date = "2011-01-28",
               end_date = "2011-02-01")

# Get detection data for specific animal project and station names and a
# limit about the number of returned records
get_detections(con, animal_project = "phd_reubens",
               deployment_station_name = c("R03", "R05"), limit = 100)

# Get detection data for specific transmitter
get_detections(con, transmitter = "A69-1303-65302")

# Get detection data for specific receiver during specific time period
get_detections(con, receiver = "VR2W-122360", start_date = "2015-12-03",
               end_date = "2015-12-05")
# Get detection data for a specific species during a given period
get_detections(con, scientific_name = "Anguilla anguilla",
               start_date = "2015-12-03",
               end_date = "2015-12-05")
# }
